Class SortPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.SortPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SortPolicy>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FullMealSort, HalfMealSort, SingleItemSort

    public abstract class SortPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<SortPolicy>, java.io.Serializable
    Allows restaurants and managers to sort the shipped orders according to different criterias: most/least ordered half-meal, most/least ordered item "Ã  la carte". Implements Comparable.
    Author:
    jeremyaugot, maxspahn
